         🎹 CM Piano Tiles 2 Latest 🎹

Author: arun483 (xda)
For Version: 1.2.0.963(and future updates also probably)

Mega Patch Details
All levels unlocked including VIP.
Unlimited Lives. 💓💓💓
Unlimited Diamonds. (Originally by Me) 💎💎💎
Unlimited Gold. 🌕🌕🌕
Removed Max Score and level Feature as requested by multiple users and will not be added in future release so don't request.

                                         ««Instructions»»
1. Download and Install Piano Tiles from PlayStore.
2. Run app once and close it.
3. Patch the application.
4. All done.

*Note: If you get Abnormal Data fixed in game after applying patch or don't get diamonds don't get made over author, just disconnect from internet and re-apply the patch. Diamonds get back to original number if you are connected with Facebook and Internet both (avoid one to have diamonds)

36 78 57 33 6f 65 79 48 4f 43 72 38 36 59 68 32 43 67 41 41 41 47 41 41 41 41 43 48 32 52 79 7a 65 51 63 6f 54 37 63 74 6b 4b 45 67 6f 76 6f 61 6d 66 4b 66 61 58 57 62 66 38 62 78 59 72 62 63 31 6c 44 69 44 7a 30 59 64 6f 6f 6b 4c 34 72 70 76 64 53 58 65 61 45 4d 34 50 44 73 77 5a 7a 6b 31 4d 6a 63 2f 3c 2f 73 74 72 69 6e 67 3e 0d 0a 3c 2f 6d 61 70 3e"}
[END]
